title: Huawei Watch_How to set the period to turn on the screen？
answer:
Swipe left on the home screen, select Settings：

  • Set Always-on Screen to be ON, the screen will be interactive mode.

    With interactive mode, if you have not any operation, the screen will change from interactive mode to ambient mode after 10s. If you touch or swipe the screen, press the power button, the screen will be waked up to be interactive mode for 5s.

    If you do not operate in this period 5s, the screen will be ambient mode again. If you continue to operate the watch, as touch the screen or press the power button, the interactive mode will be increased to 10s.

    Without any operation, the longest time of interactive mode is 10s.

  • Set Always-on Screen to be OFF, if no operation, the screen will be dim automatically after 10s. With dim status, click the screen, tilt your wrist, the screen will be waked up for 5s. If there is no operation during this period, the screen will be dim. Continue to operate your watch with interactive mode as touch the screen or press the power button, the interactive mode will be increased to 10s.
